vulnerability_findings.name: Integer Underflow
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: keccak256(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(blockNumber), msg.sender, randomSeed))

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_1.sol#78-99) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_1.sol#112-116):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)()) (patch_1.sol#113)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_1.sol#114)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_1.sol#118-122):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(wagerAmount)()) (patch_1.sol#119)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_1.sol#120)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.21;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_1.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_1.sol#112-116):
	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)()) patch_1.sol#113

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls

	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(wagerAmount)()) patch_1.sol#119
